public class GameDAO extends Object

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public models.Game getGame(int gameId) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Finds and returns the game with the given id from the database
      Parameters:
      gameId - The id of the game to find
      Returns:
      Return the game found
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when gameId is invalid or no games exist with that id

    • getAllGames

      public models.Game[] getAllGames() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Gets a list of all the games in the database
      Returns:
      A list of games
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when database is inaccessible

    • insertGame

      public void insertGame(models.Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Inserts a game into the database.
      Parameters:
      game - The game to be inserted
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when database is inaccessible

    • claimColor

      public void claimColor(models.User player, String color, int gameId) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Sets a given user to a particular color in a game
      Parameters:
      player - User claiming a color
      color - Color being claimed
      gameId - Game that the user is claiming the color
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if the color is already claimed or the gameId is invalid

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(int gameId, models.Game updatedGame) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Updates the game string at the given gameId by converting the given Game object to a string and replacing the game string with the new string
      Parameters:
      gameId - The game to be updated
      updatedGame - The updated game
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when the gameId is invalid

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(int gameId) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Removes a single game from the database
      Parameters:
      gameId - Game to remove from the database
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when the gameId is invalid

    • clearGames

      public void clearGames() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Clears all games from the database
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when database is inaccessible
